message_history.content:
Answer the given question. You must conduct reasoning inside <think> and </think> first every time you get new information. After reasoning, if you find you lack some knowledge, you can call a search engine by <search> query </search> and it will return the top searched results between <information> and </information>. You can search as many times as your want. If you find no further external knowledge needed, you can directly provide the answer inside <answer> and </answer>, without detailed illustrations. For example, <answer> Beijing </answer>. Question: I want to research Apple Inc.’s product development history by compiling a list of each generation of its flagship smartphone product line (e.g., iPhone, iPhone 3G, iPhone 3GS, … up to the iPhone 15 series) released in the U.S. market between January 9, 2007 (the original iPhone’s launch date), and December 31, 2024. 
For each model, please provide:
• Product name  
• Launch year  
• Storage capacity (separate multiple options by /, e.g. 4GB/8GB)  
• Official launch price in USD (listed separately for different capacities,e.g., $199/$299 )  
• One key new technology or feature introduced with that generation (a widely recognized highlight promoted by Apple, such as “first to support the App Store,” “first Retina display,” or “introduction of Face ID”).  
Only include the standard flagship models released each September or October (i.e., the main iPhone series and their Plus/Pro variants), excluding non-flagship lines like the SE or C series. If the launch price or key new feature cannot be confirmed, leave that field blank in the table.

Please output the sorted data in the format of one Markdown table. The column names in the table are: Product, Launch Year, Capacity, Launch Price (USD), Core New Technologies/Features.
Don't ask me any questions, just output the results according to the columns without omitting cells arbitrarily. The output format is ```markdown
{data_content}
```?

<think>
I need to gather information about each iPhone model from 2007 to 2024, including their storage capacity, official launch price, and core new technologies/features. I'll start from the first model launched in 2007 and move forward until 2024.
</think>

<search>iPhone product development history from 2007 to 2024</search>

Search query: iPhone product development history from 2007 to 2024
Result: [Doc 1](https://mobileklinik.ca/blog/iphone-evolution/):
iPhone Timeline From 2007 to 2024: An Evolution - Mobile Klinik The history and evolution of the iPhone: key milestones and design changes over the years.

[Doc 2](https://www.seamgen.com/blog/iphone-history-original-iphone-to-current-iphone):
iPhone History: From the Original iPhone to iPhone 16 - Seamgen Overview. In the following article, we explore the evolution of the iPhone from its inception in 2007 to the latest iPhone 16 models in 2024.

[Doc 3](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IPhone):
iPhone - Wikipedia The first-generation iPhone was announced by then–Apple CEO and co-founder Steve Jobs on January 9, 2007, at Macworld 2007, and launched later that year. Since ...

Search query: iPhone 15 series release date
Result: [Doc 1](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IPhone_15):
iPhone 15 - Wikipedia Pre-orders began on September 15, 2023, and the devices were made available on September 22, 2023. iPhone 15 iPhone 15 Plus ...

[Doc 2](https://www.apple.com/newsroom/2023/09/apple-debuts-iphone-15-and-iphone-15-plus/):
Apple debuts iPhone 15 and iPhone 15 Plus Pre-orders begin Friday, September 15, with availability beginning Friday, September 22. “iPhone 15 and iPhone 15 Plus represent a huge leap ...

[Doc 3](https://www.phonearena.com/iphone-15-release-date-price-features):
Apple iPhone 15 release date, price, and features - PhoneArena Apple unveiled and released the iPhone 15 series in September 2023 with tons of new features that elevate the experience in comparison with the previous iPhone ...

Based on these resources, let's compile the required information:
